title: Leaflet Not Displayed
text: The leaflet for this product can't be displayed due to validation settings.
batch_not_found: The batch number in the barcode could not be found
no_leaflet: Could not find any leaflet for scanned product.
user_type_1_description: I want to see drug SMPC first
user_type_2_description: I want to see drug Leaflet first
language_select_description: Sorry, this leaflet is only available in the following languages. Select your preference.
